quoted.text:
> LLaMA dev at Meta, 2025
> just finished "training" LLaMA 4 Maverick on 120,000 H100s
> cost more than Zuck's entire Hawaiian bunker complex
> we're gonna own these Chinese open-source posers
> @teortaxesTex on Twitter posts a link to a paper from "DeepSeek"
> some guys from Hangzhou
> their model "R1" is topping the charts
> lol, probably just overfitted trash
> boss runs into the bullpen, face whiter than a sheet
> "THEY DID WHAT ON 2000 GPUS?!"
> mfw their paper shows R1 was trained on a fraction of our compute
> their architecture is some galaxy-brain shit we didn't think of
> absolute panic
> Zuck's personal android body is seen storming towards the war room
> can hear screaming through the door
> "120K GPUS AND WE GET BEAT BY A WHALE USING A CALCULATOR?!"
> entire project delayed to April. "For more alignment." aka we're copying their homework
> finally release LLaMA 4 Maverick
> it's just a shitty fork of DeepSeek V3 with a StepMom prompt
> a complete dud
> desperate PM has a brilliant idea
> "Let's just overfit it specifically to LMARENA"
> Instantly get caught
> entire "Llama" team gets the boot. HR is working overtime with cardboard boxes
> Zuck, in a metaverse all-hands, says the classic line: "Time to double down"
> announces the "Meta Superintelligence Lab" (MSL)
> plan is to just buy success
> calls Ilya Sutskever. "I wanna buy SSI."
> Ilya literally laughs and hangs up.
> calls Mira Murati at Thinky Machine. 
> She says "We're not for sale, but our API will be available for your next product."
> absolute burn.
> Tries to recruit Altman's Lieutenant but has to settle for Altman's bottom
> buys Scale AI from Alexandr Wang for $15 billion
> the guy famous for data labeling sweatshops in SEA is now head of AI Research
> starts throwing money at every AI researcher with a pulse
> offers $100M packages, $1B packages for "superstars"
> a few mercenaries with no morals and huge gambling debts sign on
> finally has a semi-respectable team
> Wang can manage slaves not AGI researchers
> massive egos clash
> Researcher threatens to leave unless he's made "Chief Scientist," a title he invented on the spot
> a different one secretly records Wang jerking off to Sam and uses it as blackmail to get a VP role
> the MSL is a billion-dollar clown car on fire, driven by egomaniacs who are all trying to steal the steering wheel
> Zuck is in his bunker, watching a VR replay of the Facebook IPO, crying
> we had 120,000 H100sâ€¦ and we got mogged by a guy from a city best known for West Lake
PIC UNRELATED
